description.intro: This exercise takes only 3 minutes a day and helps improve your vision.
description.task: Your task is to find the matching images among the Gabor patches.
description.howToDetails: For 3 minutes, carefully search for pairs among the patches that appear to be the same.
description.howToDetails2: If you finish earlier than 3 minutes, you can reload the exercise page to see new patches.
description.whyDetails: This exercise helps your eyes strain naturally, which strengthens your eye muscles, improves focus, and relieves tension. Regular exercises improve vision without much effort.
